column3: idānīṃ śrotum icchāmi yogeśvara vada prabho ||
sādhu sādhu mahābāho yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi |
nāsti māyāsamaḥ pāśo nāsti yogāt paraṃ balam |
na hi jñānāt paro bandhur nāhaṃkārāt paro ripuḥ ||
tathā yogaṃ samāsādya tattvajñānaṃ ca labhyate ||
sukṛtair duṣkṛtaiḥ kāryair jāyate prāṇināṃ ghaṭaḥ |
ghaṭād utpadyate karma ghaṭayantraṃ yathā bhramet ||
ūrdhvādho bhramate yadvad ghaṭayantraṃ gavāṃ vaśāt |
śodhanaṃ dṛḍhatā caiva sthairyaṃ dhairyaṃ ca lāghavam |
pratyakṣaṃ ca nirliptaṃ ca ghaṭasthaṃ saptasādhanam ||
ṣaṭkarmaṇā śodhanaṃ ca āsanena bhaved dṛḍham |
prāṇāyāmāl lāghavaṃ ca dhyānāt pratyakṣam ātmani |
samādhinā nirliptaṃ ca muktir eva na saṃśayaḥ ||
dhautir vastis tathā netir laulikī trāṭakaṃ tathā |
dhautyaś caturvidhāḥ proktā ghaṭaṃ kurvanti nirmalam ||
kākacañcūvad āsyena pibed vāyuṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ |
cālayed udaraṃ paścād vartmanā recayec chanaiḥ ||
ā kaṇṭhaṃ pūrayed vāri vaktreṇa ca pibec chanaiḥ |
vārisāraṃ parāṃ dhautiṃ sādhayed yaḥ prayatnataḥ |
eṣā dhautiḥ parā gopyā na prakāśyā kadācana |
eṣā dhautiḥ parā gopyā na prakāśyā kadācana ||
tāvat prakṣālya nāḍīṃ ca udare veśayet punaḥ |
idaṃ prakṣālanaṃ gopyaṃ devānām api durlabham |
yāmārdhaṃ dhāraṇāśaktiṃ yāvan na sādhayen naraḥ |
bahiṣkṛtaṃ mahādhautī tāvan naiva tu jāyate ||
mārjayed dantamūlaṃ ca yāvat kilbiṣam āharet ||
nityaṃ kuryāt prabhāte ca dantarakṣāya yogavit |
mārjayen navanītena dohayec ca punaḥ punaḥ |
evaṃ kṛte tu nitye ca lambikā dīrghatāṃ gatā ||
nidrānte bhojanānte ca divānte ca dine dine ||
hṛnmadhye cālayitvā tu punaḥ pratyāharec chanaiḥ ||
bhojanānte pibed vāri ā karṇapūritaṃ sudhīḥ |
ūrdhvadṛṣṭiṃ kṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā taj jalaṃ vamayet punaḥ |
ārogyaṃ balapuṣṭiś ca bhavet tasya dine dine ||
apānakrūratā tāvad yāvan mūlaṃ na śodhayet |
yatnena kṣālayed guhyaṃ vāriṇā ca punaḥ punaḥ ||
jalavastiḥ śuṣkavastir vastī ca dvividhau smṛtau |
jalavastiṃ jale kuryāc chuṣkavastiṃ kṣitau sadā ||
yāvad aśru nipatate trāṭakaṃ procyate budhaiḥ ||
iḍayā pūrayed vāyuṃ recayet piṅgalā punaḥ |
pūrakaṃ recakaṃ kṛtvā vegena na tu cālayet |
nāsābhyāṃ jalam ākṛṣya punar vaktreṇa recayet |
pāyaṃ pāyaṃ prakurvaṃś cec chleṣmadoṣaṃ nivārayet ||
na jāyate vārddhakaṃ ca jvaro naiva prajāyate |
teṣāṃ madhye viśiṣṭāni ṣoḍaśonaṃ śataṃ kṛtam |
teṣāṃ madhye martyaloke dvātriṃśad āsanaṃ śubham ||
siddhaṃ padmaṃ tathā bhadraṃ muktaṃ vajraṃ ca svastikam |
siṃhaṃ ca gomukhaṃ vīraṃ dhanurāsanam eva ca ||
mṛtaṃ guptaṃ tathā mātsyaṃ matsyendrāsanam eva ca |
śalabhaṃ makaraṃ coṣṭraṃ bhujaṃgaṃ ca yogāsanam |
dvātriṃśad āsanāny eva martyaloke ca siddhidā ||
meḍhropary atha saṃnidhāya cibukaṃ kṛtvā hṛdi sthāpitam |
vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathā |
dakṣorūpari paścimena vidhinā kṛtvā karābhyāṃ dṛḍham |
aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukaṃ nāsāgram ālokayet |
pādāṅguṣṭhau karābhyāṃ ca dhṛtvā ca pṛṣṭhadeśataḥ ||
jaṅghayor vajravat kṛtvā gudapārśve padāv ubhau |
jānūrvor antare kṛtvā yogī pādatale ubhe |
pādau bhūmau ca saṃsthāpya pṛṣṭhapārśve niveśayet |
prasārya pādau bhuvi daṇḍarūpau karau ca pṛṣṭhaṃ dhṛtapādayugmam |
kṛtvā dhanustulyavivartitāṅgaṃ nigadyate vai dhanurāsanaṃ tat ||
uttānaṃ śavavad bhūmau śayānaṃ tu śavāsanam |
jānūrvor antare pādau kṛtvā pādau ca gopayet |
pādopari ca saṃsthāpya gudaṃ guptāsanaṃ viduḥ ||
kūrparābhyāṃ śiro veṣṭya matsyāsanaṃ tu rogahā ||
udare paścimaṃ tānaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhati yatnataḥ |
tatra yāmyaṃ kūrparaṃ ca yāmyakare ca vaktrakam |
bhruvor madhye gatā dṛṣṭiḥ pīṭhaṃ matsyendram ucyate ||
prasārya pādau bhuvi daṇḍarūpau saṃnyastabhālaṃ citiyugmamadhye |
yatnena pādau ca dhṛtau karābhyāṃ yogendrapīṭhaṃ paścimatānam āhuḥ ||
aṅguṣṭhābhyām avaṣṭabhya dharāṃ gulphau ca khe gatau |
dharām avaṣṭabhya karadvayābhyāṃ tat kūrpare sthāpitanābhipārśvam |
uccāsane daṇḍavad utthitaḥ khe mayūram etat pravadanti pīṭham ||
bahukadaśanabhuktaṃ bhasma kuryād aśeṣaṃ janayati jaṭharāgniṃ jārayet kālakūṭam |
harati sakalarogān āśu gulmajvarādīn bhavati vigatadoṣaṃ hy āsanaṃ śrīmayūram ||
pādatalau pṛṣṭhadeśe aṅguṣṭhau dvau ca saṃspṛśet |
vāmorumūladeśe ca yāmyaṃ pādaṃ nidhāya tu |
tiṣṭhati vṛkṣavad bhūmau vṛkṣāsanam idaṃ viduḥ ||
viparītaṃ spṛśed bhūmiṃ vṛṣāsanam idaṃ bhavet ||
adhyāsya śete padayugmavakṣe bhūmim avaṣṭabhya karadvayābhyām |
pādau ca śūnye ca vitasti cordhvaṃ vadanti pīṭhaṃ śalabhaṃ munīndrāḥ ||
adhyāsya śete hṛdayaṃ nidhāya bhūmau ca pādau pravisāryamāṇau |
śiraś ca dhṛtvā karadaṇḍayugme dehāgnikāraṃ makarāsanaṃ tat ||
adhyāsya śete padayugmam astaṃ pṛṣṭhe nidhāyāpi dhṛtaṃ karābhyām |
ākuñcya samyagghyudarāsyagaṇḍam uṣṭraṃ ca pīṭhaṃ yatayo vadanti ||
karatalābhyāṃ dharāṃ dhṛtvā ūrdhvaṃ śīrṣaṃ phaṇīva hi ||
aśvinī pāśinī kākī mātaṃgī ca bhujaṅginī |
mudrāṇāṃ paṭalaṃ devi kathitaṃ tava saṃnidhau |
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit |
prītidaṃ yogināṃ caiva durlabhaṃ marutām api ||
valitaṃ palitaṃ caiva jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ nivārayet |
yatra yatra sthito yogī sarvakāryeṣu sarvadā |
ūrdhvajihvaḥ sthiro bhūtvā dhārayet pavanaṃ sadā |
udare paścimaṃ tānaṃ nābher ūrdhvaṃ tu kārayet |
ṣaṇmāsam abhyased yo hi sa siddho nātra saṃśayaḥ ||
nābher ūrdhvam adhaś cāpi tānaṃ kuryāt prayatnataḥ |
virale sugupto bhūtvā mudrām etāṃ samabhyaset ||
sādhayed yatnatas tarhi maunī tu vijitālasaḥ ||
dakṣapādena tad gulphaṃ saṃpīḍya yatnataḥ sudhīḥ ||
śanaiḥ śanaiś cālayet pārṣṇiṃ yonim ākuñcayec chanaiḥ |
pratyahaṃ kurute yas tu sa yogī yogavittamaḥ ||
na mṛtyuto bhayaṃ tasya na jarā tasya vidyate |
jihvādho nāḍīṃ saṃchitya rasanāṃ cālayet sadā |
yāvad gacched bhruvor madhye tadā sidhyati khecarī ||
rasanāṃ tālumadhye tu śanaiḥ śanaiḥ praveśayet |
bhruvor madhye gatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī ||
na ca mūrchā kṣudhā tṛṣṇā naivālasyaṃ prajāyate |
na ca rogo jarā mṛtyur devadehaṃ prapadyate ||
na cāgnir dahate gātraṃ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ |
na dehaṃ kledayanty āpo daṃśayen na bhujaṃgamaḥ ||
lāvaṇyaṃ ca bhaved gātre samādhir jāyate dhruvam |
nābhimūle vaset sūryas tālumūle ca candramāḥ |
amṛtaṃ grasate sūryas tato mṛtyuvaśo naraḥ ||
ūrdhvaṃ ca yojayet sūryaṃ candraṃ ca adha ānayet |
bhūmau śiraś ca saṃsthāpya karayugmaṃ samāhitaḥ |
mudreyaṃ sādhayen nityaṃ jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ ca nāśayet |
sa siddhaḥ sarvalokeṣu pralaye 'pi na sīdati ||
kākībhiḥ prāṇaṃ saṃkṛṣya apāne yojayet tataḥ |
ṣaṭ cakrāṇi kramād dhṛtvā huṃhaṃsamanunā sudhīḥ ||
caitanyam ānayed devīṃ nidritā yā bhujaṅginī |
śaktimayaṃ svayaṃ bhūtvā paraṃ śivena saṃgamam |
nānāsukhaṃ vihāraṃ ca cintayet paramaṃ sukham ||
yonimudrā parā gopyā devānām api durlabhā |
sakṛt tadbhāvasaṃsiddhaḥ samādhisthaḥ sa eva hi ||
yāni pāpāni ghorāṇi upapāpāni yāni ca |
tasmād abhyasanaṃ kuryād yadi muktiṃ samicchati ||
dharām avaṣṭabhya karadvayābhyām ūrdhvaṃ kṣipet pādayugaṃ śiraḥ khe |
siddhe bindau mahāyatne kiṃ na sidhyati bhūtale ||
bhogena mahatā yukto yadi mudrāṃ samācaret |
tathāpi sakalā siddhis tasya bhavati niścitam ||
yāvat sā nidritā dehe tāvaj jīvaḥ paśur yathā |
jñānaṃ na jāyate tāvat koṭiyogaṃ samabhyaset ||
udghāṭayet kavāṭaṃ ca yathā kuñcikayā haṭhāt |
nābhiṃ bṛhad veṣṭanaṃ ca na ca nagnaṃ bahiḥ sthitam |
evam ambaram uktaṃ ca kaṭisūtreṇa yojayet ||
nāsābhyāṃ prāṇam ākṛṣya apāne yojayed balāt ||
baddhaśvāsas tato bhūtvā ca ūrdhvamātraṃ prapadyate |
śabdadvayaṃ phalaikaṃ tu yonimudrāṃ ca cālayet ||
iti te kathitaṃ caṇḍa prakāraṃ śakticālanam |
nityaṃ yo 'bhyasate yogī siddhis tasya kare sthitā |
tasya vigrahasiddhiḥ syād rogāṇāṃ saṃkṣayo bhavet ||
udare paścimaṃ tānaṃ kṛtvā ca taḍāgākṛti |
śanair grased amṛtaṃ tan māṇḍukīṃ mudrikāṃ viduḥ ||
na keśe jāyate pāko yaḥ kuryān nityamāṇḍukīm ||
sā bhavec chāmbhavī mudrā sarvatantreṣu gopitā ||
iyaṃ tu śāmbhavī mudrā guptā kulavadhūr iva ||
sa eva ādināthaś ca sa ca nārāyaṇaḥ svayam |
sa ca brahmā sṛṣṭikārī yo mudrāṃ vetti śāmbhavīm ||
satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ satyam uktaṃ maheśvara |
śāmbhavīṃ yo vijānīyāt sa ca brahma na cānyathā ||
dhāraṇāni samāsādya kiṃ na sidhyati bhūtale ||
manogatir bhavet tasya khecaratvaṃ na cānyathā ||
yat tattvaṃ haritāladeśaracitaṃ bhaumaṃ lakārānvitaṃ vedāsraṃ kamalāsanena sahitaṃ kṛtvā hṛdi sthāyinam |
prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañcaghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā stambhakarī sadā kṣitijayaṃ kuryād adhodhāraṇā ||
mṛtyuṃjayaḥ svayaṃ so 'pi sa siddho vicared bhuvi ||
śaṅkhendupratimaṃ ca kundadhavalaṃ tattvaṃ kilālaṃ śubhaṃ tat pīyūṣavakārabījasahitaṃ yuktaṃ sadā viṣṇunā |
prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañcaghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā duḥsahatāpapāpaharaṇī syād āmbhasī dhāraṇā ||
āmbhasīṃ paramāṃ mudrāṃ yo jānāti sa yogavit |
jale ca gabhīre ghore maraṇaṃ tasya no bhavet ||
iyaṃ tu paramā mudrā gopanīyā prayatnataḥ |
prakāśāt siddhihāniḥ syāt satyaṃ vacmi ca tattvataḥ ||
yan nābhisthitam indragopasadṛśaṃ bījatrikoṇānvitaṃ tattvaṃ tejomayaṃ pradīptam aruṇaṃ rudreṇa yat siddhidam |
prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañcaghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā kālagabhīrabhītiharaṇī vaiśvānarī dhāraṇā ||
pradīpte jvalite vahnau yadi patati sādhakaḥ |
yad bhinnāñjanapuñjasaṃnibham idaṃ dhūmrāvabhāsaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ sattvamayaṃ yakārasahitaṃ yatreśvaro devatā |
prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañcaghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā khe gamanaṃ karoti yamināṃ syād vāyavī dhāraṇā ||
vāyunā mriyate nāpi khe ca gatipradāyinī ||
śaṭhāya bhaktihīnāya na deyā yasya kasyacit |
datte ca siddhihāniḥ syāt satyaṃ vacmi ca caṇḍa te ||
yat sindhau varaśuddhavārisadṛśaṃ vyomaṃ paraṃ bhāsitaṃ tattvaṃ devasadāśivena sahitaṃ bījaṃ hakārānvitam |
prāṇaṃ tatra vinīya pañcaghaṭikāś cittānvitaṃ dhārayed eṣā mokṣakavāṭabhedanakarī tu syān nabhodhāraṇā ||
ākāśīdhāraṇāṃ mudrāṃ yo vetti sa ca yogavit |
na mṛtyur jāyate tasya pralaye nāvasīdati ||
kākacañcuvad āsyena pibed vāyuṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ |
asyāḥ prasādamātreṇa na rogī kākavad bhavet ||
mukhān nirgamayet paścāt punar vaktreṇa cāharet ||
nāsābhyāṃ recayet paścāt kuryād evaṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
kuryān mātaṃginīṃ mudrāṃ mātaṃga iva jāyate ||
yatra yatra sthito yogī sukham atyantam aśnute |
vaktraṃ kiṃcit suprasārya cālinaṃ galayā pibet |
yāvac ca udare rogam ajīrṇādi viśeṣataḥ |
tat sarvaṃ nāśayed āśu yatra mudrā bhujaṅginī ||
idaṃ tu mudrāpaṭalaṃ kathitaṃ caṇḍa te śubham |
śaṭhāya bhaktihīnāya na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit |
na tasya jāyate mṛtyur nāsya jarādikaṃ tathā |
nāgnijalabhayaṃ tasya vāyor api kuto bhayam ||
kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ plīhā kuṣṭhaṃ śleṣmarogāś ca viṃśatiḥ |
mudrāṇāṃ sādhanāc caiva vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ ||
bahunā kim ihoktena sāraṃ vacmi ca caṇḍa te |
yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram |
tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||
yatra yatra gatā dṛṣṭir manas tatra pragacchati |
tataḥ pratyāhared etad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||
manas tasmān niyamyaitad ātmanyeva vaśaṃ nayet ||
śītaṃ vāpi tathā coṣṇaṃ yan manaḥsparśayogataḥ |
tasmāt pratyāhared etad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||
sugandhe vāpi durgandhe ghrāṇeṣu jāyate manaḥ |
tasmāt pratyāhared etad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||
tasmāt pratyāhared etad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet ||
indriyāṇām avaśyais tair na yogī yogasādhakaḥ ||
prāṇāyāmair dahed doṣān dhāraṇābhiś ca kilbiṣam |
samaḥ samāsano bhūtvā saṃhṛtya caraṇāv ubhau |
kiṃcid unnāmitaśirā dantair dantān na saṃspṛśet |
rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ sattvena rajasas tathā |
saṃchādya nirmale sattve sthito yuñjīta yogavit ||
yas tu pratyāharet kāmān sarvāṅgān iva kacchapaḥ |
ādau sthānaṃ tathā kālaṃ mitāhāraṃ tathāparam |
nāḍīśuddhiṃ tataḥ paścāt prāṇāyāmaṃ ca sādhayet ||
yogārambhaṃ na kurvīta kṛtaś cet siddhihā bhavet ||
lokāraṇye prakāśaś ca tasmāt trīṇi vivarjayet ||
evaṃ sthāne hi gupte ca prāṇāyāmaṃ samabhyaset ||
hemante śiśire grīṣme varṣāyāṃ ca ṛtau tathā |
yogārambhaṃ na kurvīta kṛte yogo hi rogadaḥ ||
tadā yogo bhavet siddho rogān mukto bhaved dhruvam ||
dvau dvau māsau ṛtubhāgau anubhāvaś catuś catuḥ ||
caitrādi cāṣāḍhāntaṃ ca grīṣmaś cānubhavaś catuḥ |
vasante vāpi śaradi yogārambhaṃ tu samācaret |
tadā yogo bhavet siddho vināyāsena kathyate ||
mitāhāraṃ vinā yas tu yogārambhaṃ tu kārayet |
nānārogo bhavet tasya kiṃcid yogo na sidhyati ||
paṭolaṃ panasaṃ mānaṃ kakkolaṃ ca śukāśakam |
vārttākīṃ mūlakam ṛddhiṃ yogī bhakṣaṇam ācaret ||
annena pūrayed ardhaṃ toyena tu tṛtīyakam |
kaṭv amlaṃ lavaṇaṃ tiktaṃ bhṛṣṭaṃ ca dadhi takrakam |
śākotkaṭaṃ tathā madyaṃ tālaṃ ca panasaṃ tathā ||
kadambaṃ jambīraṃ bimbaṃ lakucaṃ laśunaṃ viṣam |
navanītaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ guḍaṃ śarkarādi caikṣavam ||
drākṣāṃ tu lavalīṃ dhātrīṃ rasam amlavivarjitam ||
harītakīṃ kharjūraṃ ca yogī bhakṣaṇam ācaret ||
kāṭhinyaṃ duritaṃ pūtim uṣṇaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tathā |
atiśītaṃ cāti coṣṇaṃ bhakṣyaṃ yogī vivarjayet ||
ekāhāraṃ nirāhāraṃ yāmānte ca na kārayet ||
nāḍīśuddhiṃ kathaṃ kuryān nāḍīśuddhis tu kīdṛśī |
tat sarvaṃ śrotum icchāmi tad vadasva dayānidhe ||
prāṇāyāmaḥ kathaṃ sidhyet tattvajñānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet |
nāḍīśuddhir dvidhā proktā samanur nirmanus tathā |
śṛṇuṣva samanuṃ caṇḍa nāḍīśuddhir yathā bhavet ||
candreṇa pūrayed vāyuṃ bījaṃ ṣoḍaśakaiḥ sudhīḥ ||
ṭhaṃ bījaṃ ṣoḍaśenaiva iḍayā pūrayen marut ||
evaṃ bījaṃ ṣoḍaśenaiva sūryanāḍyā ca pūrayet |
sahitaḥ sūryabhedaś ca ujjāyī śītalī tathā |
bhastrikā bhrāmarī mūrchā kevalī cāṣṭa kumbhikāḥ ||
prāṇāyāmaṃ sagarbhaṃ ca prathamaṃ kathayāmi te ||
iḍayā pūrayed vāyuṃ mātrayā ṣoḍaśaiḥ sudhīḥ |
catuḥṣaṣṭyā ca mātrayā anilaṃ kumbhakaṃ caret |
iḍayā recayet paścāt tadbījena krameṇa tu ||
prāṇāyāmaṃ nigarbhaṃ tu vinā bījena jāyate |
uttamā viṃśatir mātrā madhyamā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā |
adhamā dvādaśī mātrā prāṇāyāmās tridhā smṛtāḥ ||
adhamāj jāyate gharmo merukampaś ca madhyamāt |
ānando jāyate citte prāṇāyāmī sukhī bhavet ||
yāvat svedaṃ nakhakeśābhyāṃ tāvat kurvantu kumbhakam ||
nāgaḥ kūrmaś ca kṛkaro devadatto dhanaṃjayaḥ ||
hṛdi prāṇo vahen nityam apāno gudamaṇḍale |
vyāno vyāpya śarīre tu pradhānāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ ||
prāṇādyāḥ pañca vikhyātā nāgādyāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ |
teṣām api ca pañcānāṃ sthānāni ca vadāmy aham ||
udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ |
na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ ||
nāgo gṛhṇāti caitanyaṃ kūrmaś caiva nimeṣaṇam |
kṣuttṛṣaṃ kṛkaraś caiva jṛmbhaṇaṃ caturthena tu |
bhaved dhanaṃjayāc chabdaṃ kṣaṇamātraṃ na niḥsaret ||
sarvaṃ ca sūryakaṃ bhitvā nābhimūlāt samuddharet ||
recayitvā sādhayet tu krameṇa ca punaḥ punaḥ |
iti te kathitaṃ caṇḍa sūryabhedanam uttamam ||
nāsābhyāṃ vāyum ākṛṣya mukhamadhye ca dhārayet |
mukhaṃ praphullaṃ saṃrakṣya kuryāj jālaṃdharaṃ tataḥ |
na bhavet kapharogaś ca krūravāyur ajīrṇakam ||
āmavātaḥ kṣayaḥ kāso jvaraplīhā na jāyate |
jihvayā vāyum ākṛṣya udare pūrayec chanaiḥ |
kṣaṇaṃ ca kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā nāsābhyāṃ recayet punaḥ ||
ajīrṇaṃ kaphapittaṃ ca naiva tasya prajāyate |
tato vāyuṃ ca nāsābhyām ubhābhyāṃ cālayec chanaiḥ ||
evaṃ viṃśativāraṃ ca kṛtvā kuryācca kumbhakam |
tadante cālayed vāyuṃ pūrvoktaṃ ca yathāvidhi ||
na ca rogo na ca kleśa ārogyaṃ ca dine dine ||
karṇau nidhāya hastābhyāṃ kuryāt pūrakam uttamam ||
śṛṇuyād dakṣiṇe karṇe nādam antargataṃ sudhīḥ |
prathamaṃ jhiñjhīnādaṃ ca vaṃśīnādaṃ tataḥ param |
evaṃ nānāvidho nādo jāyate nityam abhyāsāt ||
anāhatasya śabdasya tasya śabdasya yo dhvaniḥ |
tasmiṃs tu vilayaṃ yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam |
mukhe ca kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā bhruvor antargataṃ manaḥ |
haṃkāreṇa bahir yāti saḥkāreṇa viśet punaḥ ||
ajapāṃ nāma gāyatrīṃ jīvo japati sarvadā ||
mūlādhāre yathā haṃsas tathā hi hṛdi paṅkaje |
maithune ṣaṭtriṃśad uktaṃ vyāyāme ca tato 'dhikam ||
svabhāve 'sya gater nyūne param āyuḥ pravardhate |
tasmāt prāṇe sthite dehe maraṇaṃ naiva jāyate |
ata eva hi kartavyaḥ kevalīkumbhako naraiḥ |
nāsābhyāṃ vāyum ākṛṣya kevalaṃ kumbhakaṃ caret |
kevalīm aṣṭadhā kuryād yāme yāme dine dine |
athavā pañcadhā kuryād yathā tat kathayāmi te ||
trisaṃdhyam athavā kuryāt samamāne dine dine ||
pañcavāraṃ dine vṛddhir vāraikaṃ ca dine tathā |
prāṇāyāmaṃ kevalīṃ nāma tadā vadati yogavit |
kumbhake kevale siddhe kiṃ na sidhyati bhūtale ||
sthūlaṃ jyotis tathā sūkṣmaṃ dhyānasya trividhaṃ viduḥ |
sthūlaṃ mūrtimayaṃ proktaṃ jyotis tejomayaṃ tathā |
bhramarāḥ kokilās tatra guñjanti nigadanti ca |
tanmadhye tu smared yogī paryaṅkaṃ sumanoharam |
yasya devasya yad rūpaṃ yathā bhūṣaṇavāhanam |
tad rūpaṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ sthūladhyānam idaṃ viduḥ ||
dhyāyet tatra guruṃ devaṃ vibhujaṃ ca trilocanam |
kathitaṃ sthūladhyānaṃ tu tejodhyānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me |
yad dhyānena yogasiddhir ātmapratyakṣam eva ca |
dhyāyet tejomayaṃ brahma tejodhyānaṃ tad eva hi ||
dhyāyet tejo mahad vyāptaṃ tejodhyānaṃ tad eva hi ||
bhruvor madhye manordhve ca yat tejaḥ praṇavātmakam |
dhyāyej jvālāvalīyuktaṃ tejodhyānaṃ tad eva hi ||
tejodhyānaṃ śrutaṃ caṇḍa sūkṣmadhyānaṃ vadāmy aham |
vihared rājamārge ca cañcalatvān na dṛśyate ||
sūkṣmadhyānam idaṃ gopyaṃ devānām api durlabham ||
iti te kathitaṃ caṇḍa dhyānayogaṃ sudurlabham |
ātmā sākṣād bhaved yasmāt tasmād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate ||
dine dine yasya bhavet sa yogī suśobhanābhyāsam upaiti sadyaḥ ||
ghaṭād bhinnaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā aikyaṃ kuryāt parātmani |
ahaṃ brahma na cānyo 'smi brahmaivāhaṃ na śokabhāk |
khamadhye kuru cātmānam ātmamadhye ca khaṃ kuru |
ātmānaṃ khamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā na kiṃcid api bādhyate |
mandaṃ mandaṃ recayed vāyuṃ bhṛṅganādaṃ tato bhavet ||
antaḥsthaṃ bhramarīnādaṃ śrutvā tatra mano nayet |
samādhir jāyate tatra ānandaḥ so 'ham ity ataḥ ||
ahaṃ brahmeti cādvaitaṃ samādhis tena jāyate ||
samādhiḥ sambhavet tena sambhavec ca manonmanī ||
iti te kathitaṃ caṇḍa samādhir muktilakṣaṇam |
rājayogaḥ samādhiḥ syād ekātmany eva sādhanam |
jale viṣṇuḥ sthale viṣṇur viṣṇuḥ parvatamastake |
sarvaṃ brahma vijānīyāt sarvaṃ paśyati cātmani ||
layāmṛtaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ śivoktaṃ vividhāni ca |
atha khalu bhagavantam amaravaram ṛṣigaṇaparivṛtam āśramasthaṃ kāśirājaṃ divodāsaṃ dhanvantarim aupadhenavavaitaraṇaurabhrapauṣkalāvatakaravīryagopurarakṣitasuśrutaprabhṛtaya ūcuḥ ||

bhagavan śārīramānasāgantuvyādhibhir vividhavedanābhighātopadrutān sanāthān apy anāthavad viceṣṭamānān vikrośataś ca mānavānabhisamīkṣya manasi naḥ pīḍā bhavati teṣāṃ sukhaiṣiṇāṃ rogopaśamārthamātmanaś ca prāṇayātrārthaṃ prajāhitahetor āyurvedaṃ śrotum icchāma ihopadiśyamānam atrāyattam aihikam āmuṣmikaṃ ca śreyaḥ tadbhagavantam upapannāḥ smaḥ śiṣyatveneti ||
tān uvāca bhagavān svāgataṃ vaḥ sarva evāmīmāṃsyā adhyāpyāś ca bhavanto vatsāḥ ||
iha khalv āyurvedo nāmopāṅgam atharvavedasyānutpādya iva prajāḥ ślokaśatasahasram adhyāyasahasraṃ ca kṛtavān svayambhūḥ tato 'lpāyuṣṭvam alpamedhastvaṃ cālokya narāṇāṃ bhūyo 'ṣṭadhā praṇītavān ||
tadyathā śalyaṃ śālākyaṃ kāyacikitsā bhūtavidyā kaumārabhṛtyam agadatantraṃ rasāyanatantraṃ vājīkaraṇatantram iti ||
kaumārabhṛtyaṃ nāma kumārabharaṇadhātrīkṣīradoṣasaṃśodhanārthaṃ duṣṭastanyagrahasamutthānāṃ ca vyādhīnām upaśamanārtham |
rasāyanatantraṃ nāma vayaḥsthāpanam āyurmedhābalakaraṃ rogāpaharaṇasamarthaṃ ca |
evam ayam āyurvedo 'ṣṭāṅga upadiśyate atra kasmai kim ucyatām iti ||
ta ūcuḥ asmākaṃ sarveṣām eva śalyajñānaṃ mūlaṃ kṛtvopadiśatu bhagavān iti ||
ta ūcur bhūyo 'pi bhagavantam asmākam ekamatīnāṃ matam abhisamīkṣya suśruto bhagavantaṃ prakṣyati asmai copadiśyamānaṃ vayam apy upadhārayiṣyāmaḥ ||
vatsa suśruta iha khalv āyurvedaprayojanaṃ vyādhyupasṛṣṭānāṃ vyādhiparimokṣaḥ svasthasya rakṣaṇaṃ ca ||
āyur asmin vidyate 'nena vāyur vindatīty āyurvedaḥ ||
etaddhy aṅgaṃ prathamaṃ prāg abhighātavraṇasaṃrohād yajñaśiraḥsaṃdhānāc ca |
śrūyate hi yathā rudreṇa yajñasya śiraśchinnamiti tato devā aśvināv abhigamyocur bhagavantau naḥ śreṣṭhatamau yuvāṃ bhaviṣyathaḥ bhavadbhyāṃ yajñasya śiraḥ saṃdhātavyam iti |
atha tayor arthe devā indraṃ yajñabhāgena prāsādayan |
aṣṭāsv api cāyurvedatantreṣv etad evādhikam abhimatam āśukriyākaraṇādyantraśastrakṣārāgnipraṇidhānāt sarvatantrasāmānyāc ca ||
tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ puṇyaṃ svargyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ vṛttikaraṃ ceti ||
brahmā provāca tataḥ prajāpatir adhijage tasmād aśvinau aśvibhyām indraḥ indrād ahaṃ mayā tv iha pradeyam arthibhyaḥ prajāhitahetoḥ ||
śalyāṅgamaṅgair aparair upetaṃ prāpto 'smi gāṃ bhūya ihopadeṣṭum ||
asmin śāstre pañcamahābhūtaśarīrisamavāyaḥ puruṣa ity ucyate |

tasmin kriyā so 'dhiṣṭhānaṃ kasmāt lokasya dvaividhyāt loko hi dvividhaḥ sthāvaro jaṅgamaś ca dvividhātmaka evāgneyaḥ saumyaś ca tadbhūyastvāt pañcātmako vā tatra caturvidho bhūtagrāmaḥ saṃsvedajarāyujāṇḍajodbhijjasaṃjñaḥ tatra puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ tasyopakaraṇamanyat tasmāt puruṣo 'dhiṣṭhānam ||
te caturvidhāḥ āgantavaḥ śārīrāḥ mānasāḥ svābhāvikāśceti ||
prāṇināṃ punarmūlam āhāro balavarṇaujasāṃ ca sa ṣaṭsu raseṣvāyattaḥ rasāḥ punardravyāśrayāḥ dravyāṇi punar oṣadhayaḥ |
tāsāṃ sthāvarāścaturvidhāḥ vanaspatayo vṛkṣā vīrudha oṣadhaya iti |
tāsu apuṣpāḥ phalavanto vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaphalavanto vṛkṣāḥ pratānavatyaḥ stambinyaś ca vīrudhaḥ phalapākaniṣṭhā oṣadhaya iti ||
tatra paśumanuṣyavyālādayo jarāyujāḥ khagasarpasarīsṛpaprabhṛtayo 'ṇḍajāḥ kṛmikīṭapipīlikāprabhṛtayaḥ svedajāḥ indragopamaṇḍūkaprabhṛtaya udbhijjāḥ ||
ta ete svabhāvata eva doṣāṇāṃ saṃcayaprakopapraśamapratīkārahetavaḥ prayojanavantaś ca ||
prakope praśame caiva hetur uktaś cikitsakaiḥ ||
āgantavas tu ye rogās te dvidhā nipatanti hi |
manasyanye śarīre 'nye teṣāṃ tu dvividhā kriyā ||

evam etat puruṣo vyādhir auṣadhaṃ kriyākāla iti catuṣṭayaṃ samāsena vyākhyātam tatra puruṣagrahaṇāt tatsambhavadravyasamūho bhūtādir uktas tadaṅgapratyaṅgavikalpāś ca tvaṅmāṃsāsthisirāsnāyuprabhṛtayaḥ vyādhigrahaṇād vātapittakaphaśoṇitasaṃnipātavaiṣamyanimittāḥ sarva eva vyādhayo vyākhyātāḥ oṣadhagrahaṇād dravyarasaguṇavīryavipākānām ādeśaḥ kriyāgrahaṇācchedyādīni snehādīni ca karmāṇi vyākhyātāni kālagrahaṇāt sarvakriyākālānām ādeśaḥ ||
tac ca saviṃśam adhyāyaśataṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu sūtranidānaśārīracikitsitakalpeṣv arthavaśāt saṃvibhajya uttare tantre śeṣānarthān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ ||
svayambhuvā proktamidaṃ sanātanaṃ paṭheddhi yaḥ kāśipatiprakāśitam |
sa puṇyakarmā bhuvi pūjito nṛpair asukṣaye śakrasalokatāṃ vrajet ||

brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyānām anyatamam anvayavayaḥśīlaśauryaśaucācāravinayaśaktibalamedhādhṛtismṛtimatipratipattiyuktaṃ tanujihvauṣṭhadantāgramṛjuvaktrākṣināsaṃ prasannacittavākceṣṭaṃ kleśasahaṃ ca bhiṣak śiṣyam upanayet ato viparītaguṇaṃ nopanayet ||

upanayanīyaṃ tu brāhmaṇaṃ praśasteṣu tithikaraṇamuhūrtanakṣatreṣu praśastāyāṃ diśi śucau same deśe caturhastaṃ caturasraṃ sthaṇḍilam upalipya gomayena darbhaiḥ saṃstīrya puṣpair lājabhaktai ratnaiś ca devatāḥ pūjayitvā viprān bhiṣajaś ca tatrollikhyābhyukṣya ca dakṣiṇato brahmāṇaṃ sthāpayitvāgnim upasamādhāya khadirapalāśadevadārubilvānāṃ samidbhiś caturṇāṃ vā kṣīravṛkṣāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktābhir dārvīhaumikena vidhinā sruveṇājyāhutīr juhuyāt sapraṇavābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ tataḥ pratidaivatam ṛṣīṃś ca svāhākāraṃ kuryāt śiṣyam api kārayet ||
brāhmaṇas trayāṇāṃ varṇānām upanayanaṃ kartum arhati rājanyo dvayasya vaiśyo vaiśyasyaiveti śūdram api kulaguṇasampannaṃ mantravarjam anupanītam adhyāpayed ity eke ||

tato 'gniṃ triḥ pariṇīyāgnisākṣikaṃ śiṣyaṃ brūyāt kāmakrodhalobhamohamānāhaṃkārerṣyāpāruṣyapaiśunyānṛtālasyāyaśasyāni hitvā nīcanakharomṇā śucinā kaṣāyavāsasā satyavratabrahmacaryābhivādanatatpareṇāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ madanumatasthānagamanaśayanāsanabhojanādhyayanapareṇa bhūtvā matpriyahiteṣu vartitavyam ato 'nyathā te vartamānasyādharmo bhavati aphalā ca vidyā na ca prākāśyaṃ prāpnoti ||
ahaṃ vā tvayi samyagvartamāne yadyanyathādarśī syām enobhāg bhaveyam aphalavidyaś ca ||

dvijagurudaridramitrapravrajitopanatasādhvanāthābhyupagatānāṃ cātmabāndhavānām iva svabhaiṣajaiḥ pratikartavyam evaṃ sādhu bhavati vyādhaśākunikapatitapāpakāriṇāṃ ca na pratikartavyam evaṃ vidyā prakāśate mitrayaśodharmārthakāmāṃś ca prāpnoti ||
kṛṣṇe 'ṣṭamī tannidhane 'hanī dve śukle tathāpy evam ahar dvisaṃdhyam |
nādhyeyamanyeṣu ca yeṣu viprā nādhīyate nāśucinā ca nityam ||
tatra sūtrasthānam adhyāyāḥ ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat ṣoḍaśa nidānāni daśa śārīrāṇi catvāriṃśac cikitsitāni aṣṭau kalpāḥ tad uttaraṃ ṣaṭsaṣṭiḥ ||
hitāhito vraṇapraśno vraṇāsrāvaś ca yaḥ pṛthak |
miśrakākhyo dravyagaṇaḥ saṃśuddhau śamane ca yaḥ |
vyākaraṇaṃ ca garbhasya śarīrasya ca yatsmṛtam ||
kuṣṭhānāṃ mahatāṃ cāpi maihikaṃ paiḍakaṃ tathā |
vājīkaraṃ ca yat kṣīṇe sarvābādhaśamo 'pi ca |
dundubher mūṣikāṇāṃ ca kīﾛānāṃ kalpa eva ca |
adhyāyānāṃ śataṃ viṃśam evam etad udīritam |
ataḥ paraṃ svanāmna iva tantram uttaram ucyate ||
adhikṛtya kṛtaṃ yasmāt tantram etad upadravān |
sandhau vartmani śukle ca kṛṣṇe sarvatra dṛṣﾛiṣu |
saṃvijﾤānārtham adhyāyā gadānāṃ tu prati prati ||
paittasya ślaiṣmikasyāpi raudhirasya tatha iva ca ||
cikitsā tadgadānāṃ ca śālākyaṃ tantram ucyate |
apasmāraśakunyoś ca revatyāś ca punaḥ pṛthak |
kaumāratantram ity etac chārīreṣu ca kīrtitam ||
pāṇḍūnāṃ raktapittasya mūrcchāyāḥ pānajāś ca ye ||
śālākyatantraṃ kaumāraṃ cikitsā kāyikī ca yā |
etaddhyavaśyamadhyeyaṃ adhītya ca karmāpyavaśyamupāsitavyaṃ ubhayajﾤo hi bhiṣak rājārho bhavati ||
sa satsu pūjāṃ nāpnoti vadhaṃ cārhati rājataḥ ||
te nihanti janaṃ lobhāt kuvaidyā nṛpadoṣataḥ ||
āhave karma nirvoḍhuṃ dvicakraḥ syandano yathā ||

atha vatsa tadetadadhyeyaṃ tathā tathopadhāraya mayā procyamānaṃ atha śucaye kṛtottarāsaīgāyāvyākulayopasthitāyādhyayanakāle śiṣyāya yathāśakti gurur upadiśet padaṃ pādaṃ ślokaṃ vā te ca padapādaślokābhūyaḥ krameṇānusaṃdheyāḥ evamekaikaśo ghaﾛayedātmanā cānupaﾛhet adrutam avilambitam aviśaṇkitam ananunāsikaṃ vyaktākṣram apī*itavarṇamakṣibhruvauṣﾛhahastair anabhinītaṃ susaṃskṛtaṃ nātyuccair nātinīcaiś ca svaraiḥ paﾛhet |
na cāntareṇa kaścid vrajet tayor adhīyānayoḥ ||
adhigatam apy adhyayanam aprabhāṣitam arthataḥ kharasya candanabhāra iva kevalaṃ pariśramakaraṃ bhavati ||
yathā kharaścandanabhāravāhī bhārasya vettā na tu candanasya |
evaṃ hi śāstrāṇi bahūny adhītya cārtheṣu mūḍhāḥ kharavad vahanti ||

tasmāt saviṃśam adhyāyaśatam anupadapādaślokam anuvarṇayitavyam anuśrotavyaṃ ca kasmāt sūkṣmā hi dravyarasaguṇavīryavipākadoṣadhātumalāśayamarmasirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthigarbhasambhavadravyasamūhavibhāgās tathā pranaṣṭaśalyoddharaṇavraṇaviniścayabhagnavikalpāḥ sādhyayāpyapratyākhyeyatā ca vikārāṇām evamādayaścānye sahasraśo viśeṣā ye vicintyamānā vimalavipulabuddher api buddhim ākulīkuryuḥ kiṃ punar alpabuddheḥ tasmād avaśyamanupadapādaślokam anuvarṇayitavyam anuśrotavyaṃ ca ||
anyaśāstropapannānāṃ cārthānāmihopanītānām arthavaśāt teṣāṃ tadvidyebhya eva vyākhyānam anuśrotavyaṃ kasmāt na hy ekasmin śāstre śakyaḥ sarvaśāstrāṇām avarodhaḥ kartum ||
ekaṃ śāstram adhīyāno na vidyāc chāstraniścayam |
yaḥ karma kurute vaidyaḥ sa vaidyo 'nye tu taskarāḥ ||
trividhaṃ karma pūrvakarma pradhānakarma paścātkarmeti tadvyādhiṃ prati pratyupadekṣyāmaḥ ||
